sourcesContent:
import React, {Component} from 'react' import DatePicker from 'react-datepicker' export class PersonalInfomation extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props) this.state = { fullname: '', dob: '', gender: '', password: '', email: '', phone: '', newName: '', newDOB: '', newGender: '', newPassword: '', newEmail: '', newPhone: '', startDate: new Date() } } async componentDidMount() { try { const url = 'http://localhost:2000/api/user/info?userid=' + localStorage.getItem("userID") const response = await fetch(url) if (response.ok) { const data = await response.json() if (data.message == 'true') { this.setState({ fullname: data.data.name, dob: data.data.birth, gender: data.data.gender, password: data.data.password, email: data.data.email, phone: data.data.phone }) } } } catch(e) { console.log(e) } } showNewNameEditor = e => { let show = document.getElementById("nameEdit") if (show.style.display == 'none') { show.style.display = 'block' } else { show.style.display = 'none' } } showNewDOBEditor = e => { let show = document.getElementById("dobEdit") if (show.style.display == 'none') { show.style.display = 'block' } else { show.style.display = 'none' } } handleChange = date => { this.setState({startDate: date, DOB: this.changeDate(date), dobValidation: true}) } hidePassword(password) { let newPassword = '' for (let i = 0; i < password.length; i++) newPassword += '*' return newPassword } render() { return(

Personal Information

Basic Information (like your name, photo, contact, etc.), you can update anytime you want

Profile

Some information may be visible to other users in this library

Photo:

A photo helps you to personalize your account (optional)

Name:

{this.state.fullname}

DOB:

{this.state.dob}

Gender:

{this.state.gender}

Password:

{this.hidePassword(this.state.password)}

Contact Information

Card Number:

{localStorage.getItem("userID")}

Email:

{this.state.email}

Phone:

{this.state.phone}

) } }
